/*
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_options;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_types_mapping;
*/

/* the migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping table can be created once
and populated once
*/

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping
(
    rp_type INT,
    rp_descr char(50),
    preparis_type CHAR(38),
    preparis_descr char(50)
);

insert into migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping
(rp_type, rp_descr, preparis_type, preparis_descr)
select a.rp_type, a.rp_descr, a.preparis_type, a.preparis_descr
from
(select t.* from
(values
row(10, 'DATE', '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2', 'DateTime'),
row(2, 'ShortText', '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c', 'ShortText'),
row(3, 'RADIO', 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875', 'SelectOne'),
row(0, 'PICKLIST', 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875', 'SelectOne'),
row(5, 'MULTISELECT', '76c83029-8439-42ad-90e6-7f0ff54b732c', 'SelectMany'),
row(1, 'CHECKBOX', 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792', 'TrueFalse'),
row(4, 'TEXTBOX', 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a', 'LongText'),
row(9, 'NUMERIC', '5f31785c-4d3c-4d68-a834-da37c2bc0a76', 'Numeric')) t (rp_type, rp_descr, preparis_type, preparis_descr)) a
left join migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping b on b.rp_type = a.rp_type
where b.rp_type is null;

/*custom field type mapping*/
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_types_mapping
(
    rp_area_type INT,
    rp_descr char(50),
    preparis_type CHAR(38),
    preparis_descr char(50)
);

insert into migration_custom_fields_types_mapping
(rp_area_type, rp_descr, preparis_type, preparis_descr)
select a.rp_area_type, a.rp_descr, a.preparis_type, a.preparis_descr
from
(select t.* from
(values
row(5, 'user', '0741ab49-72f7-4555-b93c-b462cbd96007', 'user')) t (rp_area_type, rp_descr, preparis_type, preparis_descr)) a
left join migration_custom_fields_types_mapping b on b.rp_area_type = a.rp_area_type
where b.rp_area_type is null;

/* Process custom fields */

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields
(
    row_num INT,
    id INT,
    areaType INT,
    name char(255),
    isRequired TINYINT(1),
    customFieldDataTypeId CHAR(38),
    customFieldTypeId CHAR(38),
    displaySequence SMALLINT,
    newCustomFieldId CHAR(38)
);

delete from migration_custom_fields
where areaType = @{pipeline().parameters.rpCustomFieldType};

insert into migration_custom_fields
(row_num, id, areaType, name, isRequired, customFieldDataTypeId, customFieldTypeId, displaySequence, newCustomFieldId)
select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cf.id) row_num,
cf.id,
cf.areaType,
cf.name,
cf.required isRequired,
cfdtm.preparis_type customFieldDataTypeId,
cftm.preparis_type customFieldTypeId,
cf.possition displaySequence,
uuid()
from t_custom_field cf
join migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping cfdtm on cf.type = cfdtm.rp_type
join migration_custom_fields_types_mapping cftm on cf.areaType = cftm.rp_area_type
where areaType = @{pipeline().parameters.rpCustomFieldType};

/* process custom fields options */

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_options
(
    row_num INT,
    id INT,
    field_id INT,
    areaType INT,
    name char(255),
    displaySequence SMALLINT,
    isDefault TINYINT(1),
    customFieldOptionStatusTypeId CHAR(38),
    newCustomFieldId CHAR(38),
    newCustomFieldOptionId CHAR(38)
);

delete from migration_custom_fields_options
where areaType = @{pipeline().parameters.rpCustomFieldType};

insert into migration_custom_fields_options
select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cfch.id) row_num,
cfch.id,
mcf.areaType,
cfch.field_id,
cfch.name optionName,
cfch.possition displaySequence,
0 isDefault,
'b5da6970-6125-4904-b87f-c39187d4fd8a' customFieldOptionStatusTypeId /*Active*/,
mcf.newCustomFieldId,
uuid() newCustomFieldOptionId
 from migration_custom_fields mcf
join t_custom_field_choice cfch on mcf.id = cfch.field_id
where mcf.areaType = @{pipeline().parameters.rpCustomFieldType};


select 'DONE' as 'Lookup Activity Hack';
